channel.title: ::resetdrops
channel.description:
So, every now and then the drops turn off... It's annoying as shit, because I have 70 players online begging for the drops to be turned on.
Is there anyway to keep the drops on? And why are they going off?

item.title: ::resetdrops
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“zerogordo, post:4, topic:315351”][quote author=Jddogg9 link=topic=411772.msg3036784#msg3036784 date=1258828342]
So, every now and then the drops turn off… It’s annoying as shit, because I have 70 players online begging for the drops to be turned on.

Is there anyway to keep the drops on? And why are they going off?
[/quote]

yea i have heard of that bug from what I understand there is not a way to fix it as we don’t know whats causing it. If I find this out i will be sure to tell you. Another reason this could be caused is by a player abusing something.[/quote]

It was working fine before, now it’s just… “hey frostie drops are off!” and i’m just like… FML

thanks anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: ::resetdrops
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

[quote=“Jddogg9, post:1, topic:315351”]So, every now and then the drops turn off… It’s annoying as shit, because I have 70 players online begging for the drops to be turned on.

Is there anyway to keep the drops on? And why are they going off?[/quote]

yea i have heard of that bug from what I understand there is not a way to fix it as we don’t know whats causing it. If I find this out i will be sure to tell you. Another reason this could be caused is by a player abusing something.

Read full topic
